    • Method Detail

      • getFileMetadata

        public static GitHubApiClient.GitHubFileResponse getFileMetadata​(java.lang.String filePath)
        Gets file metadata from GitHub API including SHA hash. Uses caching to avoid repeated requests for the same file.
        Parameters:
        filePath - Relative path within the todeploy directory
        Returns:
        GitHubFileResponse containing file metadata, or null if not found or error occurs

      • downloadFileFromUrl

        public static boolean downloadFileFromUrl​(java.lang.String downloadUrl,
                                          java.lang.String filePath,
                                          java.nio.file.Path targetPath)
        Downloads file content from a specific URL.
        Parameters:
        downloadUrl - The exact URL to download from
        filePath - Relative path of the file (for logging)
        targetPath - Local path where to save the file
        Returns:
        true if download successful, false otherwise

      • downloadFile

        public static boolean downloadFile​(java.lang.String filePath,
                                   java.nio.file.Path targetPath)

      • downloadFileFromRoot

        public static boolean downloadFileFromRoot​(java.lang.String filePath,
                                           java.nio.file.Path targetPath)
        Downloads file content from GitHub repository root.
        Parameters:
        filePath - Relative path from repository root
        targetPath - Local path where to save the file
        Returns:
        true if download successful, false otherwise

      • logCacheStatistics

        public static void logCacheStatistics()
        Logs cache statistics for monitoring.

      • clearCache

        public static void clearCache()
        Clears all cache entries and resets statistics.
